bill.title: State Fiscal Officer; authorize transfer of certain funds.
bill.description: An Act To Direct The State Fiscal Officer To Transfer Certain Special Fund Amounts To The Working Cash-stabilization Fund During Fiscal Year 2015; To Amend Section 43-13-407, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Transfer A Certain Amount Of Dollars From The Health Care Trust Fund To The Health Care Expendable Fund In Fiscal Year 2015; To Amend Sections 1 And 7 Of Chapter 102, Laws Of 2013, To Provide Certain Funds For The Rural Fire Truck Acquisition Program For Fiscal Year 2014; To Amend Section 65-37-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Suspend The Automatic General Fund Appropriation To The Local System Bridge Replacement And Rehabilitation Fund; And For Related Purposes.
